_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Discord Tickets
author: contact@eartharoid.me

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

apt update
apt install -y git curl jq file unzip make gcc g++ python python-dev libtool

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

if [[ ! -z ${VERSION} ]]; then
    echo -e \"Using version ${VERSION}\"
else
    echo -e \"Please set the VERSION variable \(e.g. v3.0.0\)\"
    exit 1
fi

if [ \"$(ls -A /mnt/server)\" ] && [[ -d .git ]]; then
    echo -e \".git directory exists\"
    if [ -f .git\/config ]; then
        echo \"Upating...\"
        git fetch --all --tags
        git checkout tags/${VERSION}
    else
        echo -e \"files found with no git config\"
        echo -e \"closing out without touching things to not break anything\"
        exit 1
    fi
else
    echo -e \"Cloning...\"
    git clone https://github.com/discord-tickets/bot.git .
	git checkout tags/${VERSION}
fi

echo \"Installing dependencies\"

if [[ ! -z ${PUGINS} ]]; then
    /usr/local/bin/npm install ${PUGINS}
fi

if [ -f /mnt/server/package.json ]; then
    /usr/local/bin/npm install --production
fi

echo -e \"Installed\"
exit 0

variables.name: Version
variables.description: The version of the bot to use.

variables.name: Plugins
variables.description: A list of extra NPM package names to install as plugins, separated by a space: "example1 exmaple2 example3"
